prompt_base: photograph of a lean, athletic young asian man, short spiky black hair, earnest and determined expression, wearing detailed Universe 6 Saiyan armor with silver and blue chestplate, realistic skin texture
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, cinematic studio lighting, sharp focus, detailed skin pores, realistic texture on armor plating (subtle wear), individual hair strands visible
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic armor, smooth skin, flat lighting, low quality, blurry details, helmet effect on hair, exaggerated features
